io.elegie.luchess.web.framework

Class Initializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.web.framework.Initializer

  • public final class Initializer
extends java.lang.Object

    The initializer is in charge of loading and initializing the client application context, using a context factory, so that the application be properly configured.

    Implementations should provide their own context factory, specifying the class name of the factory in the web.xml file, using the following key "framework.context.factory.class".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONTEXT_FACTORY_CLASS
      The key to be used in the web.xml, in order to specify an ApplicationContextFactory client class: "framework.context.factory.class".

    • Method Summary
